resources.string: Create RAM for ARM based products!
Allows the RAM to interface with the motherboard
A easy standard, reduces time needed.
Even easier! Solder it to the motherboard!
It supports LPDDR1 motherboards. Nothing special really.
LPDDR2! Improving speed, power and size!
LPDDR4! Speed, effciency, size, all in one.
A Standard mode, underclock the RAM to save battery!
A entry mode, standard ram speed for improved peformance.
Push the RAM slightly further, get extra performance for games.
Draw extra voltage for safe overclocking.
Safely push alot more Mhz with no extra voltage!
